plot: Its New Year's Eve, Los Angeles, 1958. A woman dressed in black awakes in the bungalow of a desperate actress, and tries to uncover the mystery of her being while being plagued by visions of the dark side behind the Hollywood dream.
title: Hollywood & Vine
plot_es: Its New Year's Eve, Los Angeles, 1958. A woman dressed in black awakes in the bungalow of a desperate actress, and tries to uncover the mystery of her being while being plagued by visions of the dark side behind the Hollywood dream.
